body_html:
Hi,
I've figured that we don't need to do any refresh page by hand at all. When we open the terminal by "tensorboard --logdir yoursummarydirectory", open up your browser and wait (~5 or 10 min depending on the size of your model) and it will automatically load all.
I don't know why there is a delay like that but you definitely don't need to do boring stuffs anymore, just wait !

body:
Hi,
I've figured that we don't need to do any refresh page by hand at all. When we open the terminal by "tensorboard --logdir yoursummarydirectory", open up your browser and wait (~5 or 10 min depending on the size of your model) and it will automatically load all.
I don't know why there is a delay like that but you definitely don't need to do boring stuffs anymore, just wait !
